title: Just Trains Romantic Railroads German BR01
description:
Romantic Railroads present the German Railways DB Class BR01 Reboilered Express Steam Locomotive.

The locomotives included are:

01 181 Era III displayed in as-new condition with polished boilerbands
01 187-4 with light weathering and with the computer numbering of Era IV
01 180, the only existing reboilered 01 engine, which was brought into service during 2014 by the Bavarian Railway Museum (BEM) in Nordlingen
All the locomotives and tenders boast many animated features such as opening smoke-boxes with visible authentic interiors, animated water hatches and extensive scripting to make the driving experience as authentic as possible. Two versions of each locomotive are included - a Simple version for easy driving and a more complex version that requires more skill to stop priming and even boiler explosion!

The coaches feature various animations which include doors, windows and even passengers; some even have music playing! Leaking steam heating effects are also included.

LOCOMOTIVES

Three BR01 reboilered locomotives with their respective tenders:

01 180 of the Bavarian Railway Museum NÃƒÂ¶rdlingen, reactivated and fully functional since December 2014)
01 181 era III of the German Federal Railway
001 187-4 era IV of the German Federal Railway
All the engines have opening smoke-box doors and wheel-set lighting.

Two versions of each locomotive are included - a simple and a more complex version to allow you to decide which is best for you to drive.

Fully functional PZB90 safety system included in all locos (operation in Expert mode only).


Expert Mode functions

Functional GÃƒÂ¤rtner-type soot-blower with power loss if not regularly activated
Emergency cylinder cut-off valve to reset blockages of the superheated steam regulator. These blockages occur randomly just as in the real engine
Priming with simulated damage to the cylinders
Boiler explosion when the water level in the boiler is too low

ADDITIONAL ADD-ON FEATURES

Fire truck, used as a transfer point to fill water in any tender
Static model of the electric loco E94 for display purposes

COACHES

Four coaches in steel-blue of the famous 'Dompfeil' express train, connecting Cologne with Hanover.

Three AB4ue type coaches and one coach with a dining compartment are included. All the coaches have opening windows and steam heating leaks controlled from the locomotive. The dining coach has a passenger view with animated passengers.


MANUAL

An English and German PDF manual is included
